value.name: Eric Reynolds Identified As Suspect In Officer-Involved Shooting In New Castle
value.description: 2 hours ago Victims Identified In Colorado Springs Mass Shooting At Birthday PartyColorado Springs Police officials shared an update to the mass shooting at a birthday party early on Mother's Day.

value.name: Woman dies by suicide in Garfield County jail
value.description: Investigators say Ebbs assisted her boyfriend Eric Reynolds by driving a getaway car until it had a minor accident. After the car came to a stop, New Castle Police officers fatally shot Reynolds when he apparently would not comply with commands.
